text: Another battlground Dem calls on Biden to withdraw  —  A 19th Hill Democrat is calling on President Joe Biden to withdraw from the ticket — one of California's most vulnerable Democrats.  “First, let me say that President Biden has been an outstanding leader, not only of our nation, but of the entire free world.

Is Kamala Harris Ready for Trump?  —  Vice President Kamala Harris seemed to have one goal at a campaign rally in Greensboro, North Carolina, yesterday: Prove she's ready to square up to Donald Trump.  Harris said Trump's name 15 times in fewer than 20 minutes, and you could hear the disdain in her voice each time.
